name: View Current Weather Details
description: As a user, I want to view the real-time current weather conditions for a selected location so that I can understand the present weather situation.

name: Display Weather for Current Location
description: As a user, I want the system to automatically display the current weather for my detected geographical location so that I can quickly see relevant information without manual input.

name: Search for Weather by Location
description: As a user, I want to search for and select a specific city or location so that I can view its current weather conditions.

name: Ensure Real-time Weather Data
description: As a user, I want the displayed current weather conditions to be updated frequently and automatically so that I always see the most recent information.

name: View Hourly Forecast for Selected Location
description: As a user, I want to view the hourly weather forecast for my selected location so that I can plan my activities hour by hour.

name: Search and Select Location for Forecast
description: As a user, I want to be able to search for and select a specific location so that I can view its hourly weather forecast.

name: Auto-Detect Current Location for Forecast
description: As a user, I want the system to automatically use my current location as the default so that I can quickly see the hourly forecast for where I am.

name: Display Essential Hourly Weather Details
description: As a user, I want to see the temperature, precipitation chance, and a weather condition icon for each hour so that I have essential hourly weather information at a glance.

name: Display Comprehensive Hourly Weather Details
description: As a user, I want to see additional details like wind speed, humidity, and UV index for each hour so that I can get a comprehensive understanding of hourly conditions.

name: View Extended Hourly Forecast Range
description: As a user, I want to view the hourly forecast for at least the next 24 hours so that I can plan my day and night effectively.

name: Navigate Hourly Forecast Timeline
description: As a user, I want to easily navigate through the hourly forecast timeline so that I can see predictions for future hours.

name: Select Weather Location
description: As a user, I want to search for and select a specific location so that I can view its weather forecast.

name: View Daily Temperature and Conditions
description: As a user, I want to view the daily high and low temperatures and general weather conditions (e.g., sunny, cloudy, rainy) for a selected location so that I can quickly understand the day's outlook.

name: View Detailed Daily Weather Metrics
description: As a user, I want to view additional detailed daily weather information such as chance of precipitation, wind speed and direction, and humidity for a selected location so that I can make informed plans.

name: View Multi-Day Forecast Summary
description: As a user, I want to view daily forecasts for multiple upcoming days so that I can plan my activities for the week ahead.

name: Search for a location by name or zip code
description: As a user, I want to search for a location by typing its name or zip code so that I can find the specific place I want to view weather data for.

name: View search suggestions and results
description: As a user, I want to see a list of matching locations with relevant details (e.g., city, state, country) as I type in the search bar so that I can quickly select the correct one.

name: Select a location from search results
description: As a user, I want to select a location from the search results so that its weather information becomes the primary view.

name: Automatically detect current location
description: As a user, I want the application to automatically detect my current geographical location so that I can view local weather without manual input.

name: Add current location to saved list
description: As a user, I want to add the currently viewed location to a list of my saved locations so that I can easily access its weather data again later.

name: View list of saved locations
description: As a user, I want to view a list of all my saved locations so that I can quickly navigate between them.

name: Select a location from saved list
description: As a user, I want to select a location from my saved list so that its weather data is displayed.

name: Remove a location from saved list
description: As a user, I want to remove a location from my saved list so that I can keep my list relevant and uncluttered.

name: Add a new saved location
description: As a user, I want to add a new location to my saved list so that I can quickly access information for that location in the future.

name: View all saved locations
description: As a user, I want to see a list of all my saved locations so that I can easily manage and select them.

name: Edit an existing saved location
description: As a user, I want to modify the details of an existing saved location so that I can keep my saved locations accurate and up-to-date.

name: Remove a saved location
description: As a user, I want to delete a saved location from my list so that I can remove locations I no longer need.

name: Request Location Permission
description: As a user, I want the application to request permission to access my location so that it can automatically detect my current geographical position.

name: Display Location-Relevant Information
description: As a user, I want the application to automatically detect my current location so that I can view information relevant to my geographical position.

name: Show Detected Location
description: As a user, I want to see the specific geographical location that was automatically detected so that I can verify its accuracy.

name: Handle Denied Location Access
description: As a user, I want the application to gracefully handle denied location access so that I am informed and can still use the application without location-based features.

name: Inform of Location Detection Failure
description: As a user, I want to be informed if automatic location detection fails so that I understand why location-based information is not available.

name: Access Application Settings
description: As a user, I want to access a dedicated section for application settings so that I can customize my user experience.

name: Configure Units of Measurement
description: As a user, I want to select my preferred units of measurement (e.g., metric or imperial) so that all relevant data is displayed in a format I understand.

name: Manage General Notification Preferences
description: As a user, I want to enable or disable all notifications from the application so that I can control my overall alert experience.

name: Customize Notification Categories
description: As a user, I want to enable or disable specific categories of notifications (e.g., system updates, new messages) so that I only receive alerts relevant to my interests.

name: Select Notification Delivery Method
description: As a user, I want to choose my preferred method for receiving notifications (e.g., push, email, SMS) so that alerts are delivered in a way that suits me best.

name: View Real-time Radar Imagery
description: As a user, I want to view real-time weather radar imagery on an interactive map so that I can see current precipitation and storm movements.

name: View Real-time Satellite Imagery
description: As a user, I want to view real-time satellite imagery on an interactive map so that I can see current cloud cover and atmospheric conditions.

name: Zoom on Imagery
description: As a user, I want to be able to zoom in and out on the radar and satellite imagery so that I can get a more detailed or broader view of weather patterns.

name: Pan Across Imagery
description: As a user, I want to be able to pan across the radar and satellite imagery so that I can explore different geographical areas.

name: View Time-lapse of Imagery
description: As a user, I want to view a time-lapse of past radar and satellite imagery so that I can observe the progression of weather systems over time.

name: View Future Precipitation Map
description: As a user, I want to see an interactive visual representation of future precipitation so that I can anticipate rain, snow, or other precipitation events.

name: View Future Temperature Map
description: As a user, I want to see an interactive visual representation of future temperature changes so that I can understand how temperatures will fluctuate over time.

name: View Future Wind Map
description: As a user, I want to see an interactive visual representation of future wind patterns so that I can understand wind direction and speed.

name: Control Forecast Time Progression
description: As a user, I want to control the time progression of the weather visualizations (e.g., play, pause, scrub) so that I can analyze future conditions at specific moments or observe trends.

name: Select Weather Visualization Type
description: As a user, I want to easily switch between different future weather visualizations (e.g., precipitation, temperature, wind) so that I can focus on the specific weather elements I care about.

name: Select Location for Historical Data
description: As a user, I want to select a specific geographical location so that I can retrieve its historical weather data.

name: Define Timeframe for Analysis
description: As a user, I want to specify a custom date range (e.g., specific days, months, or years) so that I can focus my historical weather data analysis on a particular period.

name: View Historical Temperature Data
description: As a user, I want to view historical temperature readings (e.g., daily high, low, average) for a selected location and timeframe so that I can understand past temperature variations.

name: View Historical Precipitation Data
description: As a user, I want to view historical precipitation amounts (e.g., total rainfall, snowfall) for a selected location and timeframe so that I can analyze past water events.

name: View Other Historical Meteorological Parameters
description: As a user, I want to view historical data for additional meteorological parameters (e.g., humidity, wind speed, atmospheric pressure) for a selected location and timeframe so that I can gain a comprehensive understanding of past weather conditions.

name: Visualize Historical Data Trends
description: As a user, I want to see historical weather data presented in interactive charts and graphs so that I can easily identify patterns, anomalies, and trends over time.

name: Compare Historical Data Across Timeframes
description: As a user, I want to compare historical weather data for the same location across different selected timeframes so that I can observe long-term changes and trends.

name: Select weather layers for display
description: As a user, I want to select which specific weather layers (e.g., temperature, precipitation, wind) are displayed on the map so that I can customize the information I see.

name: Add or remove data overlays
description: As a user, I want to add or remove contextual data overlays (e.g., city labels, road networks, radar stations) to the weather map so that I can enhance or simplify the visualization.

name: Choose color scheme for visualizations
description: As a user, I want to choose from a variety of predefined color schemes for weather visualizations so that I can personalize the map's appearance and improve readability.

name: Set preferred temperature unit
description: As a user, I want to select my preferred temperature unit (Celsius or Fahrenheit) so that I can view temperatures in a familiar scale.

name: Set preferred wind speed unit
description: As a user, I want to select my preferred wind speed unit (e.g., km/h, mph, knots) so that I can understand wind data in a familiar measurement.

name: Set preferred precipitation unit
description: As a user, I want to select my preferred precipitation unit (e.g., mm or inches) so that I can understand precipitation data in a familiar measurement.

name: Set preferred pressure unit
description: As a user, I want to select my preferred atmospheric pressure unit (e.g., hPa, inHg, mmHg) so that I can understand pressure data in a familiar measurement.

name: Receive Immediate Severe Weather Alerts
description: As a user, I want to receive immediate push notifications for severe weather events so that I am promptly informed of potential dangers.

name: Get Warnings for Current Location
description: As a user, I want to receive severe weather warnings relevant to my current location so that I am informed about immediate dangers around me.

name: Manage Monitored Locations
description: As a user, I want to be able to add and manage multiple locations for severe weather warnings so that I can monitor conditions for places important to me (e.g., home, work, family).

name: Understand Warning Details
description: As a user, I want severe weather notifications to include clear details about the event (e.g., type, severity, affected area, expected duration) so that I can quickly understand the threat and take appropriate action.

name: Control Notification Delivery
description: As a user, I want to be able to enable or disable severe weather warning notifications so that I can control when I receive alerts.

name: Customize Warning Types
description: As a user, I want to be able to customize the types of severe weather warnings I receive (e.g., heavy rain, snow, extreme temperatures, high winds, poor air quality) so that I only get alerts for conditions relevant to my concerns.

name: Configure New Forecast Notification
description: As a user, I want to select a location and choose between daily or periodic frequency for a new weather forecast notification so that I can define the fundamental alert parameters.

name: Set Daily Notification Time
description: As a user, I want to specify the exact time of day for my daily weather forecast notification so that I receive it when it's most convenient for me.

name: Set Periodic Notification Interval
description: As a user, I want to specify the interval (e.g., every 3 hours) for my periodic weather forecast notification so that I receive updates throughout the day.

name: Select Notification Weather Parameters
description: As a user, I want to select specific weather parameters (e.g., temperature, precipitation chance, wind speed) to be included in my forecast notification so that I only get the information most relevant to me.

name: View Configured Notifications List
description: As a user, I want to view a list of all my configured weather forecast notifications so that I can easily manage them.

name: Edit Existing Forecast Notification
description: As a user, I want to edit the settings (location, frequency, time, parameters) of an existing weather forecast notification so that I can adjust my alerts without recreating them.

name: Enable or Disable Forecast Notification
description: As a user, I want to enable or disable an existing weather forecast notification so that I can temporarily pause or resume receiving alerts.

name: Delete Forecast Notification
description: As a user, I want to delete an existing weather forecast notification so that I no longer receive unwanted alerts.

name: Receive Personalized Forecast Push Notification
description: As a user, I want to receive a push notification containing my personalized weather forecast at the configured time/interval so that I get timely and relevant updates.

name: Receive Current Location Weather Alerts
description: As a user, I want to receive proactive weather alerts for my current location so that I am informed about immediate weather conditions around me.

name: Manage Current Location Alert Preference
description: As a user, I want to enable or disable the use of my current location for weather alerts so that I can control my privacy and alert relevance.

name: Add Saved Location for Alerts
description: As a user, I want to add a specific location to my saved list so that I can receive weather alerts for places important to me.

name: Remove Saved Location for Alerts
description: As a user, I want to remove a location from my saved list so that I no longer receive alerts for places I'm not interested in.

name: Receive Saved Location Weather Alerts
description: As a user, I want to receive proactive weather alerts for my saved locations so that I am informed about weather conditions in places I care about.

name: Manage Individual Saved Location Alert Preference
description: As a user, I want to enable or disable alerts for individual saved locations so that I can control which specific places I receive notifications for.

name: Customize Alert Types
description: As a user, I want to customize the types of weather events I receive alerts for (e.g., severe weather, precipitation, temperature changes) so that I only get notifications relevant to my needs.

name: Manage General Alert Settings
description: As a user, I want to manage general alert settings (e.g., notification sound, vibration, quiet hours) so that alerts are delivered according to my preferences.

name: View Alert History
description: As a user, I want to view a history of received weather alerts so that I can review past notifications and understand weather events.

name: Access Notification Preferences
description: As a user, I want to access my notification preferences so that I can manage my alert subscriptions.

name: View Available Alert Types
description: As a user, I want to view a list of all available alert types so that I can understand what notifications are offered.

name: Enable Specific Alert Types
description: As a user, I want to enable specific alert types so that I receive notifications for the information I find relevant.

name: Disable Specific Alert Types
description: As a user, I want to disable specific alert types so that I stop receiving notifications I no longer wish to get.

name: Adjust Notification Frequency
description: As a user, I want to select a notification frequency for each alert type so that I receive updates at my preferred interval (e.g., immediate, daily, weekly).

name: Manage Push Notification Channel
description: As a user, I want to enable or disable push notifications as a delivery channel so that I can control whether I receive real-time alerts on my device.

name: Set Push Notification Quiet Hours
description: As a user, I want to set specific quiet hours for push notifications so that I am not disturbed during certain times.

name: Fast Page and Section Loading
description: As a user, I want application pages and sections to load quickly so that I can access information and features without delay.

name: Responsive UI Interactions
description: As a user, I want my clicks, inputs, and other UI interactions to respond instantly so that the application feels smooth and efficient.

name: Rapid Data Retrieval and Display
description: As a user, I want lists, search results, and other data to load and display rapidly so that I can view the information I need without waiting.

name: Quick Form Submission and Processing
description: As a user, I want forms to submit and process quickly so that I can complete tasks efficiently.

name: Application Stability During Operations
description: As a user, I want the application to remain responsive and not freeze during complex operations so that my workflow is not interrupted.

name: Easy Navigation to Main Sections
description: As a user, I want to easily find and access the main sections and features of the application so that I can quickly get to where I need to go.

name: Understand Current Location
description: As a user, I want to clearly understand my current location within the application so that I can navigate confidently without getting lost.

name: Identify Interactive Elements
description: As a user, I want to clearly identify clickable buttons, links, and other interactive elements so that I know what actions I can perform.

name: Receive Action Feedback
description: As a user, I want to receive clear and immediate feedback after performing an action (e.g., saving, submitting) so that I know if it was successful or if an issue occurred.

name: Understand Input Requirements
description: As a user, I want input fields to clearly indicate what information is required and in what format so that I can easily provide correct data.

name: Readable Content Presentation
description: As a user, I want all text and information to be presented in a clear, legible, and well-organized manner so that I can easily read and understand it.

name: Understand and Resolve Errors
description: As a user, I want error messages to clearly explain what went wrong and how to fix it so that I can quickly resolve issues and continue my task.

name: Guided First-Time Experience
description: As a new user, I want clear guidance and hints when first using the application so that I can quickly understand its core functionalities and get started.

name: Modern and Clean User Interface
description: As a user, I want the application to have a modern and clean visual design so that it is pleasant and intuitive to use.

name: Consistent Brand Identity
description: As a user, I want the application to consistently display brand elements (e.g., logo, primary colors, typography) across all pages so that I can easily recognize and trust the brand.

name: Consistent Interactive Elements
description: As a user, I want all interactive elements (e.g., buttons, input fields, navigation links) to have a consistent design and behavior so that I can easily understand and interact with the application.

name: Consistent Layout and Non-Interactive Elements
description: As a user, I want non-interactive elements (e.g., headings, icons, spacing, information display) to follow a consistent design pattern so that the interface feels organized and professional.

name: Adaptive Layout for Screen Sizes
description: As a user, I want the application's layout to automatically adjust to my device's screen size so that all content is displayed clearly and without excessive scrolling or empty space.

name: Scalable Content Readability
description: As a user, I want text and images within the application to scale appropriately on my device's screen so that all content is easily readable without manual zooming or horizontal scrolling.

name: Responsive Navigation Elements
description: As a user, I want the application's navigation elements (e.g., menus, tabs) to adapt to my device's screen size so that I can easily access all features without clutter or difficulty.

name: Optimized Touch Target Sizes
description: As a user, I want interactive elements (e.g., buttons, links) to be appropriately sized for touch input on my mobile device so that I can easily tap them without errors.

name: Seamless Device Orientation Change
description: As a user, I want the application's layout to adjust correctly when I rotate my device (portrait to landscape and vice-versa) so that I can continue using the app seamlessly in my preferred orientation.

name: Optimized Performance Across Devices
description: As a user, I want the application to load quickly and perform smoothly on my mobile device, regardless of its screen size or resolution, so that I have an efficient and frustration-free experience.
